Description: Egypt, small group of adult males at work. Sitting and standing outdoors, appear to be twisting rope. Skeins of rope or yarn hanging from rope in trees in background. Males wearing shirts, waist-coats, head-gear, trousers or cloths around lower bodies. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Circumstances: The Imperial War Museum holds photographs from the same collection with a more military content - see [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
Condition: Small hole in image at centre.
